duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver quality training to new team members focusing on high engagement, productivity, and retention.
Coordinate with Team Leadership, Store Trainer, and other team members to schedule and complete new member training.
Facilitate team-specific operational training and program rollouts for team members.
Maintain and update accurate training records using the company's learning systems.
Provide customer-obsessed service and maintain a positive image as a role model.
Train team members on customer service standards, product knowledge, and safety procedures.
Complete assigned training and engage with all communication platforms as per company guidelines.

education_certification.credential: 6 months of Whole Foods Market experience (or equivalent retail training experience)
